short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of using Ctrl + Tab?    Try this!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our goal is to help you increase the efficiency of your workflow. This extension will enable your ability to navigate through dozens of opened tabs and identify which tabs can be closed in a split of a second.

Features:
       -Show timestamps of last visited time.
       -Automatically close tabs that you have not visited for a long time
       -Detect and close duplicate tabs to reduce memory use
       -Quick search of websites via title or web-link
       -Allow you to customize the features of this extension

Update:
       -Fixed some typos
       -Fixed default auto-close threshold. Yikes

Enjoy! 
:)
